title: The Philosopher
provenance_text:
Milton Goldring [1918-2009], New York, NY [1]; Grand Central Moderns, New York, NY [2]; Leland Hazard [1893-1980], Pittsburgh, PA, January 1959 until February 2, 1961; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February, 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 179) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959.
[2]. The gallery was the artist's agent.
[3]. The painting was purchased by Mr. Hazard from the International for $750. Payment to Grand Central Moderns was made on January 8, 1959.
